actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to make available to Nevada the Red Rock Recreation Lands, located in Clark County, Nev., for use for park and recreation purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to make available to Nevada the Red Rock Recreation Lands, located in Clark County, Nevada, for use for park and recreation purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to make available to Nevada the Red Rock Recreation Lands, located in Clark County, Nev., for use for park and recreation purposes.
